channel.title: Others can't join server
channel.description:
hi,
I started a server server since a week ago. the problem is that other people can't get in.. I did portforwarding so thats okay
on sites like moparscape or runelocus when I register my server, they all say that my server is online and playable but still people can't get in.. I gave them my client and changed the ip to mine and they also tried on webclient with changeable ip
anyone knows what I can do?
Thanks

item.title: Others can't join server
item.dc:creator: @kennethd4 kennethd4
item.description:
@kennethd4 wrote:

Thanks guys for these answers, i’m gonna try it

Read full topic

item.title: Others can't join server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Make sure you have added an exception to your OS firewall to allow incoming and outgoing connections for port 43594 or 5555 which ever your server uses, you have no clue how many people forget to do this and end up trying to figure it out for days.

Read full topic

item.title: Others can't join server
item.dc:creator: @JoesServers JoesServers
item.description:
@JoesServers wrote:

Check the port is correct in the client, source, and on your router manager. Make it 43595 and if you cant find it in the source try finding a file called server.cfg or something like that, Then change them to your correct port, Be sure also you have put the right ip everywhere you see 127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0 in the client.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic

i always get errors like : client null disconnected from ip: … on my cmd so i think that’s the problem
